Our creative industries will play a crucial part in the recovery.

name: Vignesh Shivan
text: RT @timesofindia: Today @MIB_India have released a detailed SOP for resuming work in the media production industry. The general principlesâ€¦
retweet_text: Today @MIB_India have released a detailed SOP for resuming work in the media production industry. The general principles behind the SOP will help create a safe working environment for cast & crew in the industry: Prakash Javadekar, Union Minister for Information & Broadcasting https://t.co/YrxHWKIhSZ

name: Vignesh Shivan
text:
RT @ndtv: 3. Make-up artists, hair stylist to use PPE

4. Persons handling shared equipment to wear gloves

5. Lapel mics may be avoided anâ€¦
retweet_text:
3. Make-up artists, hair stylist to use PPE

4. Persons handling shared equipment to wear gloves

5. Lapel mics may be avoided and never shared

6. Direct contact with diaphragm of mic to be avoided

7. Minimise use of props, sanitisation of props before use

#COVID19

name: Vignesh Shivan
text:
RT @ndtv: Ministry of Information and Broadcasting Releases Prevention Measures For #MediaProduction | Contact Minimisation

1. Face coversâ€¦
retweet_text:
Ministry of Information and Broadcasting Releases Prevention Measures For #MediaProduction | Contact Minimisation

1. Face covers/masks mandatory for cast and crew, except for actors in front of camera

2. Sharing of costumes, wigs, makeup item etc to be kept at minimum

#COVID19

Not every Indian film is "Bollywood". That's just the industry that makes Hindi-language cinema.

Sincerely, etc.
